name: Pokémon Master Trainer Board Game
description: Classic Pokémon board game by MB. Challenge players to travel, battle, and collect Pokémon to become the ultimate Master Trainer. Complete games are highly sought after.

name: Talking Baby Sinclair Plush
description: Talking plush figure based on the popular TV show Dinosaurs. Features the iconic catchphrase 'Not the mama!'.

name: Donatello 'Pizza Time'
description: Playmates 1992 Wacky Action line. Mint on card. Unpunched. The pizza-throwing mechanism still functions perfectly through the blister pack testing port.

name: Mutatin' Raphael
description: Playmates 1992 Wacky Action line.

name: Raphael - Trenchcoat
description: Playmates 1990 Movie Star line. Rubber texture. Loose, complete. Includes the sai weapons and the fedora hat which is often missing.

name: Goliath - Stone Sleep
description: Kenner 1995. Hard-to-find Stone Sleep variant. 12 inch wingspan. Features 'stone' armor plating that snaps on.

name: Boba Fett - Kenner 1979
description: Kenner 1979 original release. Unpunched 21-Back card. The holy grail for many collectors. Blister is clear with no yellowing.

name: Pokémon Pikachu 35mm Camera
description: Tiger Electronics 1999. Fully functional 35mm film camera with built-in flash. Features a molded Pikachu sitting on the top housing. Lens cover intact.

name: Talking  Ultimate Warrior 12"
description: Hasbro 1991. Massive 12-inch scale figure. Pull-string voice mechanism tested and working: 'Feel the power of the Warrior!' Paint apps on face paint are crisp.

name: MicroStars Gold and Silver Bundle
description:
Premium bundle of 9 Vintage Corinthian MicroStars (2001/2002). Contains the highly sought-after Gold and Silver base figures featuring high game stats.

Gold Base Figures:

  • MC589 Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid)
  • MC211 Jaap Stam (Man Utd)
  • MC369 Alen Boksic (Middlesbrough)

Silver Base Figures:

  • MC185 Patrick Kluivert (Barcelona)
  • MC341 Luis Enrique (Barcelona)
  • MC344 Thierry Henry (Arsenal)
  • MC188 Michael Mols (Rangers)
  • MC337 Lucas Radebe (Leeds)
  • MC354 David James (Aston Villa)

name: MicroStars Bulk Starter Lot
description:
Massive instant collection of 43 Corinthian MicroStars from UK Series 1 & 2. Includes the rare McDonald's promo Sol Campbell. Detailed manifest below:

Green Base:

  • MC016 Kewell (Leeds)
  • MC027 Di Canio (West Ham)
  • MC032 Seaman (Arsenal)
  • MC247 Silvinho (Arsenal) - Sealed
  • MC251 Barmby (Liverpool)
  • MC252 Giggs (Man Utd)
  • MC258 Sutton (Celtic) x2
  • MC263 Barthez (Man Utd)
  • MC268 James (Aston Villa)
  • MC256 Henry (Arsenal)
  • MC259 Boksic (Middlesbrough)
  • MC262 Barthez (Man Utd)
  • MC379 Albertz (Rangers)
  • MC467 Rivaldo (Brazil/Barcelona)
  • MC473 Raul (Spain/Real Madrid)
  • MSE1351 Sol Campbell (McDonalds Promo)

Red Base:

  • MC045 Harte (Leeds)
  • MC047 Stam (Man Utd)
  • MC053 Lampard (West Ham)
  • MC058 Ginola (Aston Villa)
  • MC054 Speed (Newcastle) - Marked on bottom
  • MC059 Shearer (Newcastle)
  • MC068 Di Canio (West Ham)
  • MC076 Seaman (Arsenal)
  • MC269 Silvinho (Arsenal) x2
  • MC273 Barmby (Liverpool) - Marked on bottom
  • MC273 Barmby (Liverpool) - Paint wear on nose
  • MC278 Henry (Arsenal)
  • MC280 Sutton (Celtic)

Blue Base:

  • MC295 Barmby (Liverpool)
  • MC300 Henry (Arsenal)
  • MC301 Zola (Chelsea)

White Base:

  • MC136 Speed (Newcastle)
  • MC140 Ginola (Aston Villa)
  • MC141 Shearer (Newcastle)
  • MC147 Mols (Rangers)
  • MC314 Desailly (Chelsea)
  • MC322 Henry (Arsenal)
